Pixel corner latitudes.descrp: latitudes of the ground pixel corners (WGS84)

Pixel corner longitudes.descrp: longitudes of the ground pixel corners (WGS84)

SZA.descrp: zenith angle of the Sun at the ground pixel location (WGS84); angle measured away from the vertical

Solar Azimuth Angle.descrp: azimuth angle of the Sun at the ground pixel location (WGS84); angle measured East-of-North

LoS Azimuth.descrp: azimuth angle of the satellite at the ground pixel location (WGS84); angle measured East-of-North

LoS ZA.descrp: zenith angle of the satellite at the ground pixel location (WGS84); angle measured away from the vertical

Latitude.descrp: latitude of the ground pixel center (WGS84)

Longitude.descrp: longitude of the ground pixel center (WGS84)
